description: This file defines a mock class `Store2NotificationMock` for unit testing, which implements the `INotification` interface from the `WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2` namespace. It includes mock method `ValueChanged` using Google Mock, and sets up interface mapping macros.

classes.name: Store2NotificationMock
classes.description: Mock implementation of the INotification interface for testing purposes, utilizing Google Mock.

methods.name: ValueChanged
methods.description: Mock method to simulate notification of a value change, parameterized by scope, namespace, key, and value.

calls: MOCK_METHOD(void, ValueChanged, (const WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2::ScopeType scope, const string& ns, const string& key, const string& value), (override))
